name: AP_CLAIM_IF_INFO_2
description: The table contains information sent to or returned from a prospective payment systems (PPS) pricer.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BMI_FCTR_SEP_PYBL
columns.description: Separately payable portion of bundled BMI factor utilized for cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: BSA
columns.description: Body Surface Area (BSA) of patient.

columns.name: BSA_FCTR_SEP_PYBL
columns.description: Separately payable portion of bundled BSA factor utilized for cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: AGE_FCTR_BUND_PPS
columns.description: Age adjustment utilized for the bundled prospective payment of dialysis services.

columns.name: BMI_FCTR_BUND_PPS
columns.description: BMI factor for the bundled prospective payment of dialysis services.

columns.name: BSA_FCTR_BUND_PPS
columns.description: BSA factor for the bundled prospective payment of dialysis services.

columns.name: COMORB_FCTR
columns.description: Comorbidity adjustment utilized for the prospective payment of dialysis services.

columns.name: COMORB_FCT_SEP_PBL
columns.description: Separately payable portion of comorbidity factor utilized for cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: LOW_VOL_ADJ
columns.description: Low volume adjustment utilized for the bundled prospective payment of dialysis services.

columns.name: LOW_VOL_ADJ_SEP_PBL
columns.description: Separately payable portion of low volume factor utilized for cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: PASS_THRU_PMT
columns.description: Additional payment for pass-through expenses.

columns.name: MEAN_LOS
columns.description: Mean Length of Stay.

columns.name: ADDL_MEAN_LOS
columns.description: Additional Mean Length of Stay

columns.name: DRG_WEIGHT
columns.description: DRG-specific weight utilized for patient pricing.

columns.name: PER_DIEM
columns.description: Per Diem Reimbursement.

columns.name: TIERED_PER_DIEM
columns.description: Tiered Per-Diem Reimbursement.

columns.name: DRG_PAYTYPE
columns.description: DRG Specific Pricing Rule.

columns.name: INLIER_RATE
columns.description: Inlier Rate.

columns.name: TRANSFER_FLAG
columns.description: Transfer Flag.

columns.name: OPR_IME_PMT
columns.description: Operating Indirect Medical Education (IME) Payment.

columns.name: OPR_DSH_PMT
columns.description: Operating Disproportionate Hospital (DSH) Payment.

columns.name: CAP_IME_PMT
columns.description: Capital Indirect Medical Education (IME) Payment.

columns.name: CAP_DSH_PMT
columns.description: Capital Disproportionate Hospital (DSH) Payment.

columns.name: REIMB_DRG
columns.description: Reimbursement DRG.

columns.name: PAYMENT_CMG
columns.description: Contains a payment-related Case Mix Group (CMG).

columns.name: PAYMENT_HIPPS
columns.description: Health Insurance Prospective Payment System (HIPPS) code returned by the pricer.

columns.name: PPS_PENALTY_AMT
columns.description: This field contains the dollar amount of any applicable penalty.

columns.name: PAYMENT_FLAG_CMG
columns.description: Payment flag for Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility (IRF) priced claims.

columns.name: TRANSFER_FLAG_CMG
columns.description: Transfer flag for IRF priced claims.

columns.name: PENALTY_FLAG
columns.description: Penalty flag.

columns.name: PENALTY_PERCENT
columns.description: This field contains the percentage the facility was penalized.

columns.name: HIPPS_WEIGHT
columns.description: Relative weight for payment HIPPS code.

columns.name: HIPPS_AVG_LOS
columns.description: Average length of stay for payment HIPPS code.

columns.name: OUTLIER_CHRGS
columns.description: Charges used to determine applicable cost outlier payments.

columns.name: OUTLIER_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Cost outlier threshold for payment HIPPS code.

columns.name: ASSESSMNT_TDATE
columns.description: Assessment transmission date.

columns.name: AIDS_ADJ_FACTOR
columns.description: AIDS adjustment factor.

columns.name: TOT_THIRD_PARTY_PMT
columns.description: Total third party payment is the total reimbursement for this claim minus patient coinsurance.

columns.name: OR_PROC_FOR_DRG
columns.description: First three operating room procedures that influenced DRG assignment.

columns.name: NOR_PROC_FOR_DRG
columns.description: First and second non-operating room procedures that influenced DRG assignment.

columns.name: COMRBD_DX_FOR_DRG
columns.description: Diagnosis code that satisfied the complication/comorbidity (CC) criteria and influenced DRG assignment.

columns.name: DX_FOR_DRG
columns.description: First three diagnoses (other than principal) that influenced DRG assignment.

columns.name: NUM_OF_MCCS
columns.description: Number of major complications/comorbidities in the claim not excluded by the principle diagnosis.

columns.name: NUM_OF_CCS
columns.description: Number of complications/comorbidities in the claim not excluded by the principle diagnosis.

columns.name: ADM_MOTOR_SCR_CALC
columns.description: Total motor score calculated from IRF-PAI admission motor scores.

columns.name: ADM_MOTOR_SCR_FLAG
columns.description: Admission motor score flag.

columns.name: ADM_COGN_SCR_CALC
columns.description: Sum of fields 39N through 39R on the Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility Patient Assessment Instrument (IRF-PAI).

columns.name: ADM_COGN_SCR_FLAG
columns.description: Admission cognitive score flag.

columns.name: DEMOG_ERR_CNT
columns.description: Count of total demographic errors encountered for the input record.

columns.name: AGE_EDIT
columns.description: Age edit.

columns.name: SEX_EDIT
columns.description: Sex edit.

columns.name: DISCHRG_DISP_EDIT
columns.description: Discharge disposition edit.

columns.name: BWGT_EDIT
columns.description: Birthweight edit.

columns.name: MCE_DX_ERR_CNT
columns.description: Count of total diagnosis errors encountered.

columns.name: PRINC_DX_ERRS
columns.description: Principal diagnosis errors.

columns.name: PRINC_DX_SURG_EDIT
columns.description: Principal Diagnosis/Surgery Edit.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_ECODE_ERR
columns.description: Admit Diagnosis External Cause of Injury Code/Manifestation Code.

columns.name: MCE_PX_ERR_CNT
columns.description: Count of total procedure errors encountered.

columns.name: NON_SPEC_PX_EDIT
columns.description: Nonspecific Procedure Edit.

columns.name: BILAT_CODING_EDIT
columns.description: Bilateral coding edit.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_INVALID
columns.description: Admit Diagnosis Invalid.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_AGE_SEX
columns.description: Admit Diagnosis Age/Sex

columns.name: ADM_DX_MED_SEC_ALRT
columns.description: Admit Diagnosis Medicare as Secondary Payer Alert.

columns.name: MCE_TOT_ERRS
columns.description: Total Date-Sensitive Code Editor/Medicare Code Editor errors for this claim.

columns.name: PERCENT_CHRGS
columns.description: Percent of Charges Value.

columns.name: GRPR_SEV_ILLNESS
columns.description: Identifies severity of illness associated with claim level diagnosis. Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: GRPR_RSK_MORTALITY
columns.description: Identifies risk of mortality associated with claim level diagnosis. Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: AGE_DAYS_OF_ADMISSION
columns.description: Age in days as the number of days between birth date and the date of admission. Required for neonates. Data sent in PCB2.ICD block on the outgoing message.

columns.name: AGE_DAYS_OF_DISCHARGE
columns.description: Age in days as the number of days between the birth date and the date of discharge. Required for neonates. Data sent in PCB2.ICD block on the outgoing message.

columns.name: OR_PROC_01
columns.description: Identifies the first three operating room procedures that influenced DRG assignment. Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: NON_OR_PROC_01
columns.description: Identifies the first and second non-operating room procedures that influenced DRG assignment. Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: COMORBIDITY_DX_01
columns.description: Identifies diagnosis code that satisfied the Complication/Comorbidity (CC) criteria and influenced DRG assignment. Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: DX_FOR_DRG_01
columns.description: Identifies the first three diagnoses (other than principal) that influenced DRG assignment. Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: ADMISSION_DRG
columns.description: Identifies the admission Diagnosis Related Group (DRG). Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: ADMISSION_SOI
columns.description: Identifies level of severity of illness at admission. Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: ADMISSION_ROM
columns.description: Identifies risk of mortality at admission. Data received in GOB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: ADMIT_MOTOR_SCORE_CALC_2
columns.description: Identifies motor-out score redefined with 3 digits following the decimal. Data received in GOB1.CMG block on incoming message.

columns.name: ADMIT_COGNITIVE_SCORE_CALC_2
columns.description: Identifies cognitive-out score redefined with 3 digits following the decimal. Data received in GOB1.CMG block on incoming message.

columns.name: ICD10_COMORBIDITY_01
columns.description: Identifies comorbidity code that is at the highest comorbidity tier for the case. Data received in GOB1.CMG block on incoming message.

columns.name: ICD10_COMORBIDITY_02
columns.description: Identifies comorbidity code that is at the highest comorbidity tier for the case and part of an ICD-10 code pair. Data received in GOB1.CMG block on incoming message.

columns.name: SHORT_STAY_OUTL_TRIM
columns.description: Identifies short stay or day outliers. Data received in POB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: LONG_STAY_OUTL_TRIM
columns.description: Identifies long stay or day outliers. Data received in POB1.DRG block on incoming message.

columns.name: COST_OUTL_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Identifies predicted map plus fixed dollar loss amount that is utilized for the cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: TOT_PRED_ESRD_OUTL_PMT
columns.description: Identifies total predicted amount of separately payable services per dialysis treatment on monthly bill. For ESRD only. Data received in POB1.APC block on incoming message.

columns.name: NUM_DIALYSIS_LN_ITEM
columns.description: Identifies number of dialysis claim lines. For ESRD only. Data received in POB1.APC block on incoming message.

columns.name: CORE_BASE_STAT_AREA
columns.description: Identifies core based statistical area. For ESRD only. Data received in POB1.APC block on incoming message.

columns.name: RET_CODE_38_OVR_FLG
columns.description: Flag indicating whether or not the claim-level Pricer Return Code 38 (Invalid or Missing Required Claims Data) has been overridden. For ESRD only. Data received in POB1.APC block on incoming message.

columns.name: AGE_EDIT_IND
columns.description: Indicates an age edit. Data received in MEB1 block on incoming message.

columns.name: NUM_OF_VISITS
columns.description: Identifies total number of visits on the claim.

columns.name: CAPITAL_ADDON
columns.description: Identifies total capital add-on for the claim.

columns.name: BLEND_FACTOR
columns.description: Identifies portion of Ambulatory Patient Group (APG) payment applied to the claim.

columns.name: RATE_CODE_INDICATOR
columns.description: Identifies payment rules applied to the claim, based on the APG rate code supplied on claim.

columns.name: TOTAL_EXISTING_PAYMENT
columns.description: Identifies total payment for non-APG portion of visits on claim. Only applies to facility types subject to transitions.
